model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a model for a user. Has a name, username, password, and list of albums This model implements serializable
    Since:
    2016-03-26
    Author:
    Corentin Rejaud, Julia Sutula
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • albumNameExists

        public boolean albumNameExists(java.lang.String albumName)
        albumNameExists Checks to see if albumName exists already in albums. Necessary to check when adding new albums. Album names must be unique
        Parameters:
        albumName - albumName to be checked before adding
        Returns:
        true if the album name already exists, else false
